description:
After seeing her in a dream, Kazuhito recalls his younger sister Harumi Madoka. His nostalgia is cut short when Akiyama Shinobu`s editor Hiiragi Suzuna appears, a massive masochist with huge breasts prone to fantasizing. What`s worse, Natsuno is in a slump?! As they discuss how to get over her slump, the subject of a mysterious slasher case arises.
However, lurking in the shadows of the incident are glimpses of Akiyama Shinobu`s book and Madoka...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Winter Dog Flies into the Fire
Tonde Hi ni Iru Fuyu no Inu
飛んで火に入る冬の犬
